column5: Beautifully decorated cottage. Quaint, cozy, and romantic. Small kitchenette with fridge, coffee pot, and microwave. Pool, pool house, grill, and hammock open to guests.  Points of interest: Riverwalk, Six Flags, Boerne, Fredericksburg, La Cantera Mall, The Alamo, Enchanted Rock, The San Antonio Missions, bike trails, golf courses, Top Golf, food trucks and more!  My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.  Yo hablo espa√±ol.
